Description: Cracking contraptions
Place and push a button
Flick a lever
Step on a pressure plate
Use a pressure plate to craft a detector rail
Craft an iron weighted pressure plate
ActualRequirements: Obtain a Heavy Weighted Pressure Plate

Description: Craft a golden weighted pressure plate
ActualRequirements: Obtain a Light Weighted Pressure Plate

Description: Place a line of string between two tripwire hooks, and trigger it
ActualRequirements: Stand on an attached line of tripwire that has not been defused

Description: Trigger a trapped chest. Good for trolling your friends!
Craft and place a redstone torch
Craft a redstone repeater for delaying signals
Mine Nether Quartz
Craft a redstone comparator
Read the power signal of a Chiseled Bookshelf using a comparator
ActualRequirements: Place a comparator facing outwards from a Chiseled Bookshelf OR place a Chiseled Bookshelf behind a comparator

Description: Craft a daylight sensor
Craft an observer
Mine enough nether quartz to craft a stack of nether quartz blocks
Craft a hopper for item transportation
Craft a dropper for item transportation
Construct a dispenser
Put up a Target for archery practise
Hit a Target with all types of projectiles
ActualRequirements: Hit a Target with the following projectiles: Arrow, Trident, Fishing Rod, Egg, Snowball, Potion (either splash or lingering), Firework Rocket, Experience Bottle, and Ender Pearl

Description: Hit the bullseye of a Target Block with an arrow
ActualRequirements: Output a signal strength of 15 on a Target using an arrow from 30 blocks away

Description: Craft a piston so you can push things
Craft a sticky piston so you can pull things
Craft all types of redstone components
ActualRequirements:
Obtain the following items: Redstone, Redstone Torch, Redstone Block, Repeater, Comparator, Target, Lever, Oak Button, Stone Button, Oak Pressure Plate, Stone Pressure Plate, Light-Weighted Pressure Plate, Heavy-Weighted Pressure Plate, 
Sculk Sensor, Calibrated Sculk Sensor, Sculk Shrieker, Amethyst Block, White Wool, String, Lectern, Daylight Detector, Lightning Rod, Piston, Sticky Piston, Slime Block, Honey Block, Dispenser, Dropper, Hopper, Chest, Barrel, Chiseled Bookshelf, 
Furnace, Trapped Chest, Jukebox, Observer, Note Block, Composter, Cauldron, Rail, Powered Rail, Detector Rail, Activator Rail, Minecart, Hopper Minecart, Chest Minecart, Furnace Minecart, TNT Minecart, Oak Boat with Chest, Bamboo Raft with Chest, 
Oak Door, Iron Door, Oak Fence Gate, Oak Trapdoor, Iron Trapdoor, TNT, Redstone Lamp, Bell, Big Dripleaf, Armor Stand, Redstone Ore
For "Master Engineer" a stack of each of these items is required.
Basically, any item in the "Redstone" tab in the Creative inventory is required

Description: Craft a stack of all types of redstone components
ActualRequirements:
Obtain the following items: Redstone, Redstone Torch, Redstone Block, Repeater, Comparator, Target, Lever, Oak Button, Stone Button, Oak Pressure Plate, Stone Pressure Plate, Light-Weighted Pressure Plate, Heavy-Weighted Pressure Plate, 
Sculk Sensor, Calibrated Sculk Sensor, Sculk Shrieker, Amethyst Block, White Wool, String, Lectern, Daylight Detector, Lightning Rod, Piston, Sticky Piston, Slime Block, Honey Block, Dispenser, Dropper, Hopper, Chest, Barrel, Chiseled Bookshelf, 
Furnace, Trapped Chest, Jukebox, Observer, Note Block, Composter, Cauldron, Rail, Powered Rail, Detector Rail, Activator Rail, Minecart, Hopper Minecart, Chest Minecart, Furnace Minecart, TNT Minecart, Oak Boat with Chest, Bamboo Raft with Chest, 
Oak Door, Iron Door, Oak Fence Gate, Oak Trapdoor, Iron Trapdoor, TNT, Redstone Lamp, Bell, Big Dripleaf, Armor Stand, Redstone Ore
For "Master Engineer" a stack of each of these items is required.
Basically, any item in the "Redstone" tab in the Creative inventory is required

Description: Craft a note block
Tune a Note Block through every possible note
Play every possible instrument on a Note Block
ActualRequirements:
Play a Note Block that is on top of the following blocks: Wood, Sand/Gravel/Concrete Powder, Glass/Sea Lantern, Stone, Gold Block, Clay, Packed Ice, Wool, Bone Block, 
Iron Block, Soul Sand, Pumpkin, Emerald Block, Hay Bale, Glowstone, Any Other Block (e.g. Dirt)

Description: Play a Note Block in every type of biome
ActualRequirements:
Play a Note Block in one biome from the following categories: Snowy Tundra, Snowy Taiga, Windswept Hills, Taiga, Giant Tree Taiga, Plains, Forest, Birch Forest, 
Dark Forest, Swamp, Jungle, River, Beach, Mushroom Fields, Desert, Savanna, Badlands, Warm Ocean, Lukewarm Ocean, Ocean, Cold Ocean, Frozen Ocean, Meadow, Snowy Slopes/Grove, Peaks,
Nether Wastes, Soul Sand Valley, Crimson Forest, Warped Forest, Basalt Deltas, The End, Lush Caves, Dripstone Caves, Deep Dark, Cherry Grove

Description: Play Note Blocks with each type of mob head above it
ActualRequirements: Play a note block with a Zombie, Skeleton, Wither Skeleton, Creeper, Piglin and Dragon Head on top
ItemRewards: 1 Brown Shulker Box containing 32 Note Blocks and 1 of each type of head

Description: Craft and board a Minecart for railway journeys
Notes: Known as "On A Rail" until 1.13 Alpha Build 4

Description: Craft a Minecart with Furnace and use coal or charcoal to send it chugging
ActualRequirements: Use coal or charcoal on a Minecart with Furnace

Description: Put a chest in a minecart
Put a hopper in a minecart
Put TNT in a minecart
Making furnace minecarts completely useless
Craft a stack of all the different types of rails
ActualRequirements: Obtain 64 of each of Rails, Powered Rails, Detector Rails and Activator Rails

Description: Travel by Minecart in a straight line to at least 1 km from where you started
Use Silk Touch to pick up a Sculk Sensor or find one among Ancient City treasure
Notes: Hidden and in the Redstone tab until 1.14 Alpha Build 1

Description: Craft a Calibrated Sculk Sensor using Amethyst Shards
Use Silk Touch to pick up a Sculk Shrieker
Collect a stack of all sculk-related blocks
ActualRequirements: Collect a stack of: Sculk, Sculk Veins, Sculk Sensors, Sculk Catalysts, Sculk Shriekers and Calibrated Sculk Sensors

Description: Hold a Shulker Box that is completely filled with Sculk
Kill a Wither near a Sculk Catalyst to unleash a large explosion of sculk
Kill every hostile monster near a Sculk Catalyst
ActualRequirements: See the requirement notes for "Monsters Hunted" in the Adventure tab. Ender Dragon is not required
